Name: WasteLand Express 废土快递
About the game: [Core play] Players drive a vehicle to play games on the endless Gobi desert. Players have great freedom. You can choose to go to various settlements. During the journey, you will encounter all kinds of emergencies and all kinds of weather. Players choose according to specific events and their own game ideas, which will trigger different event results, From beginning to end, the game just gives a starting point and end point, no matter how you reach it. You can experience the results of various choices, whether to arm your own chariot, go directly to the end, explore the whole map, accept the tasks received in the city, or enter dangerous places to search for materials. These are the players' own choices. [Game Content] -Accept entrustment, hunt bounty hunters, build cities, resell commodities and search for waste land. There are many ways to grow yourself -Complete the main line, trigger the branch line and emergencies. With a rich plot and more than 10W words of text, there is always a free world to explore -Become a just soldier, a selfish businessman, a vicious bandit, all your choices are up to you
